```{r}
library(caTools)
set.seed(123)
ds_CV <- ds_new
ds_CV$Split <- NA
ds_CV$Split <- sample.split(seq_len(nrow(ds_CV)), SplitRatio = .75)
train<- subset(ds_CV, Split == TRUE)
test <- subset(ds_CV, Split == FALSE)

pred <- predict(mod_SS_inter, newdata = test, type = "response")
diff <- pred - test$Actual_Time
diff2 <- (diff)^2
mspe <- mean(diff2)
```
